channel.title: Daft Mesa a black mesa/daft punk mash-up of sorts
channel.description:
I realized that the tram women's voice(the original not Catz) is at the exact tempo of the the song voyager by Daft Punk so I made this.
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pVS-gu69sK0[/url]
you can download it here [url]https://www.mediafire.com/download.php?ayydyztym5f[/url]

item.title: Daft Mesa a black mesa/daft punk mash-up of sorts
item.dc:creator: Dr_Perky
item.description:
mattemuse:

it aint daft punk but it is the HL1 voiceover!
DivShare File - meas.wav

:fffuuu: too much vocoder IMHO. but i still like it, it works really well on repeat

Read full topic

item.title: Daft Mesa a black mesa/daft punk mash-up of sorts
item.dc:creator: Dr_Perky
item.description:
mattemuse:

Needs more vocoder - in fact, if you post the Tram announcer sound file I’ll do it with vocoder - even better would be Catz’s voiceover, although I have no idea if they’ve released samples of that or not

I’d do it with catz but
1.her tempo is off for the song its self
and 2.yeah no version of hers without music over it

here’s original
https://www.catzeyes93.com/music/Black%20Mesa%20Transit%20System-Intercom.wav
just right click and save link as.
if you want to attempt to somehow extract Catz version heres the track with black mesa theme playing over it
https://www.catzeyes93.com/music/00%20-%20mesaladywootdemo.mp3

Read full topic

item.title: Daft Mesa a black mesa/daft punk mash-up of sorts
item.dc:creator: Dr_Perky
item.description:
Thanks

yeah I’m not a huge Mash-up fan either why its called a mash up of sorts its not by definition a mash up just something I realized and decided to try out and it worked quite well.
